channel.title: Menu on If I had a diner

item.title: A big salad
item.description: yea, you know, a big salad

item.title: fruit salad
item.description: I’m very particular about fruit salad. So much so that, I just can’t even handle thinking about someone who currently right now at this very moment is sitting here working on a website for their lovely babe who means the entire world to them, and they’re forced to endure the pain of just thinking about how someone out thre is just ‘enjoying’ a fruit salad made with a lot of underripened melon and a single grape.
